MAN.TITLE: TK_EvalStr
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Evaluate a string whithin the tcl/tk interpreter
Evaluate a string whithin the tcl/tk interpreter (obsolete)

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string or vector of strings, contains the tcl/tk instructions

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine allows to evaluate tcl/tk instructions with the tcl/tk interpreter launched with scilab.

When tcl/tk support is enabled in scilab, you can evaluate tcl/tk expression from scilab interpreter. In fact, scilab launches a slave tcl/tk interpreter. The scilab instruction TCL_EvalStr() can be used to evaluate expression without having to write a tcl/tk in a separated file (this is done using TCL_EvalFile).
